Cerrone has serious problems with fighters who are high pressure and stand in the pocket. Playing right into Masvidal's hands, he's hurt.
Masvidal closing the distance, trying to neutralise Cerrones' kicks. Relative success. Cerrone downed at end of round #UFCDenver
